key_talking_points: Edmonton's Cody Ceci was penalized for holding the stick at 2:54 of the first period against Florida. The Oilers will go on the penalty kill.
Florida and Edmonton are trading shots early in the first, with a recent shot on goal by Florida's Carter Verhaeghe at 2:57. Shots on goal are 43 for Florida and 47 for Edmonton
for_commentary_agent.context: Penalty creates a power play opportunity; monitor shot volume and scoring chances.

high_intensity_events.summary: Cody Ceci (EDM) called for holding penalty against Carter Verhaeghe (FLA)

task_details.specific_guidance: Focus on the impact of the penalty and the ensuing power play.  A one-goal game in the first period makes every power play critical.
